$_hasMany [protected]
Initial value:
 array (
        'scientific_contacts' => '',
        'research_areas' => '',
        'targets' => '',
        'telescopes' => '',
        'instruments' => '')

Array of all 1-N relations: 1 observatory can have N entries 1 telescope can have N instruments key is target table, value are foreign keys
